com.se.simplicity.model
Interface Model

All Known Implementing Classes:
SimpleModel
public interface Model

A container for the internal model structure compatible with SceneGraphs. The internal model structure is composed of a graph of ModelNodes which becomes a subset of a scene's SceneGraph. Each ModelNode in the Model's graph contains a VertexGroup which represents a portion of (or possibly the entire) Model's vertices. The Model can be split into multiple VertexGroups to provide structures optimised for animation and/or enhanced rendering performance.

Author:
Gary Buyn
